lead_paragraph: Gloria Steinem and Christine Ahn, who were among a group of women crossing the DMZ in Korea, say “we’re still waiting” for a peace deal 62 years after the war.

headline.main: Giving Women a Role in Korean Peace Negotiations
headline.print_headline: Giving Women a Role in Korean Peace Negotiations

snippet: Gloria Steinem and Christine Ahn, who were among a group of women crossing the DMZ in Korea, say “we’re still waiting” for a peace deal 62 years after the war.
